EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for stopping by the Pivotal booth at Microsoft Build
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thanks for stopping by the booth for a chat about adopting cloud-native application architectures to drive modern, software experiences for your users. If you’d like to discuss a hands-on workshop day in your offices or at a nearby hotel, simply inquire here <[[http://pivotal.io/cloud-native-workshop?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-microsoft-build-seattle-q218]]>.
In the meantime, if you’re interested in learning more about how Pivotal Cloud Foundry (PCF) works with .NET, Java, Azure, and the Microsoft ecosystem we have lots of online resources <[[https://content.pivotal.io/net-and-the-return-of-windows?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-microsoft-build-seattle-q218]]> to help. If you are looking for spare capacity for CI builds, temporary development or test environments, check out Pivotal Web Services <[[http://run.pivotal.io?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-microsoft-build-seattle-q218]]>, a great public cloud for running .NET and Java Spring microservices on Cloud Foundry! Also don’t forget to check out the free eBooks <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-microsoft-build-seattle-q218]]> we have for you on cloud-native applications, microservices, and much more.
Check out some of our offerings for developers, and some cool blogs, videos and talks about CF on Azure here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/microsoft-build-seattle-2018?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-microsoft-build-seattle-q218]]>.
Stay in touch and join the conversation on our blogs <[[http://content.pivotal.io/blog?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-microsoft-build-seattle-q218]]>, podcasts <[[http://blog.pivotal.io/podcasts-pivotal?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-microsoft-build-seattle-q218]]>, and on Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/pivotal]]>. We hope to see you again soon at a future event <[[https://pivotal.io/news-events?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-microsoft-build-seattle-q218]]>! The Pivotal Team
